author: The Associated Press
title: What you need to know today about the virus outbreak
description: Christians observed Good Friday without the solemn church services or emotional processions of past years
content:
Christians observed Good Friday without the solemn church services or emotional processions of past years, instead watching livestreams at home as the world remained locked down by the coronavirus pandemic. 
The global death toll headed toward 100,000, with … [+4283 chars]
